author.name: Vicky and Ruth from May I Have That Recipe

description: High Protein Caprese Pasta Salad - A light and fresh gluten free dish is full of protein and fiber, perfect for lunch or as a light dinner this summer! It can also be made Vegan!
name: High Protein Caprese Pasta Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 - 8 ounce package Explore Cuisine Organic Chickpea Fussili
8 ounces marinated mozzarella balls or vegan mozzarella ( for instructions on how to make it at home, click HERE )
1/4 cup pesto, store bough or home made (recipe follows)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta following package instructions. Drain well and set aside
Transfer the pasta to a large bowl, add the rest of the ingredients and toss well. Refrigerate until ready to serve
